summary: This is a U.S. Marshals Service Prisoner Custody Alert Notice for Jeffrey Edward Epstein, documenting his status as a federal prisoner with alerts for sex trafficking conspiracy and mental health concerns including suicidal tendencies.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the prisoner custody alert notice, identified by prisoner number and charged with sex trafficking conspiracy.

events.title: Prisoner Custody Alert Prepared
events.description: A U.S. Marshals Service Prisoner Custody Alert Notice was prepared for Jeffrey Edward Epstein, documenting his charges and mental health alerts.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Edward Epstein was a federal prisoner with the prisoner number 76318-054.
Epstein was charged with a violation of 18 USC 371, specifically 'SEX TRAFFICKING CONSPIRACY'.
The custody alert notice included mental health concerns, specifically noting 'Suicidal Tendencies'.
The document was prepared on July 8, 2019, by the U.S. Marshals Service.
